column5: Ocean Grove Condos is a upscale, gated community with unobstructed oceanfront view! This 7th floor condo has 3 bedrooms with 1 king size bed, 2 queen size beds, 2 bathrooms, and fully stocked kitchen. Two assigned underground parking spaces. In the event this condo is booked on your selected dates checkout my other unit https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/4255632.
